snippet.title: Longplay of Scooby-Doo! Mystery Mayhem
snippet.description:
Longplay of Scooby-Doo! Mystery Mayhem, played as the NTSC version on the GameCube. This game's version was released on Mar. 2nd, 2004. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start
0:01:10 - Episode 1: The Haunting of Hambridge
0:25:35 - Episode 1: Boss
0:31:45 - Episode 2: Mayhem at the Movies
1:21:37 - Episode 2: Boss
1:28:00 - Episode 3: Weird Wild West
1:49:35 - Episode 3: Boss
1:55:20 - Episode 4: Bad Juju in the Bayou
2:26:30 - Episode 4: Boss
2:32:08 - Episode 5: Hi-Tech Terror
3:04:06 - Episode 5: Final boss
3:11:00 - Credits
